attributes.action: remove the profit element from M.P's second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Where the second home has been wholly or part funded at taxpayers expence, we should see a return of monies and benefit from any profit made.
A way that this could be managed would that at the disposal of each and every second owned by M.P's, they should return a percentage of the total profit. This should be at 50% or higher once the calcuations are done.
This would remove the notion and impression of being on the Westminister gravy train, and re-assert the value of public service.
To ensure compliance it should be made clear that to do otherwise is fraud.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
